structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Administration And Enforcement Of Unemployment Insurance System And Medical Security Trust Fund By Director Of Workforce Development
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 27, 2011. For text effective March 27, 2011, see below.] The director of workforce development shall administer and enforce the unemployment insurance system and the Medical Security Trust Fund established in section 14G of chapter 151A. The director, with the approval of the secretary, may assign personnel, responsibilities and duties under federal law to any office or division within the department in order to maximize efficiency of resources and delivery of services. Chapter 23H: Administration and enforcement of unemployment insurance system and Medical Security Trust Fund by director of unemployment assistance [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 3, Sec. 89 effective March 27, 2011. For text effective until March 27, 2011, see above.] The director of unemployment assistance shall administer and enforce the unemployment insurance system and the Medical Security Trust Fund established in section 14G of chapter 151A. The director, with the approval of the secretary, may assign personnel, responsibilities and duties under federal law to any office or division within the department in order to maximize efficiency of resources and delivery of services.
